title: Canada sits 2 points behind Italy for bronze-medal position in team event final
desc: Canada currently sits in fourth place after the ice dance free program in the finals of the figure skating Team Event. Host nation Italy sits in bronze position with a narrow two point lead.

title: The slow death of Keir Starmer's prime ministership after Peter Mandelson's 'betrayal'
desc: Starmer's decision to hand the plum job of UK ambassador in Washington to Lord Peter Mandelson, despite knowing Mandelson had maintained a friendship with Jeffrey Epstein well past Epstein's conviction for soliciting underage prostitution, may simply be too large an error of judgement for the public to accept.

title: PM to meet Trump in DC this week, says Iran talks must deal with missiles, proxies
desc: Netanyahu slated to fly to Washington Tuesday, be back in Israel by Friday; Witkoff, Kushner tour US aircraft carrier a day after holding talks with Iran's FM in Oman

title: Jonathan Nolan Praises 'The Odyssey' As "Spectacular Film"
desc: As cinephiles await the big screen event that is 'The Odyssey', Jonathan Nolan has given his early review of the movie.

title: Algeria moves to terminate air services pact with UAE amid rising tensions
desc: Algeria has initiated the cancellation of its air services agreement with the United Arab Emirates, first established in 2013. | Business Insider Africa

title: Police arrest 53-year-old man for threat of death and illegal possession of a firearm
desc: The Accra Regional Police Command has arrested a 53-year-old man for allegedly threatening an investigator with a firearm and unlawfully possessing a weapon and ammunition.

title: Thailand votes after three leaders in two years
desc: Analysts anticipate Anutin Charnvirakul could retain the premiership by again allying with Pheu Thai.

title: Seed-sized creature reveals how oceans moved 5 million years ago
desc: A tiny algae recently discovered in India is helping to reconstruct how the oceans moved millions of years ago.

title: Pep Guardiola rues missed chances with Man City adrift in title race
desc: Pep Guardiola has accepted a lack of cutting edge is costing his Manchester City side, after a run of just one win in six games.
